name: [PlayDate] Blocks !
description:
Blocks !

"Blocks !" is a 2D puzzle game for the PlayDate. Your objective is to fill the grid with blocks as fast as possible.

Game is still under development, you can support the game by making a donation.

Controls

  • Arrows to move the piece
  • Crank to change the selected piece
  • "A" to place the piece

Credits :

  • Development, Art : Charlito33
  • Music : fesliyanstudios.com
